qas.question: How many households were in Oklahoma city?
What demographic was the most percentage of the households in total?
What is the average size for households?
What is the average size for families?
What is the second highest demographic for households?

context: There were <a0_0>230,233<a0_0/> households, 29.4% of which had children under the age of 18 living with them, 43.4% were <a1_0>married couples<a1_0/> living together, 13.9% had a female householder with no husband present, and 37.4% were <a4_0>non-families<a4_0/>. One person households account for 30.5% of all households and 8.7% of all households had someone living alone who is 65 years of age or older. The average household size was <a2_0>2.47<a2_0/> and the average family size was <a3_0>3.11<a3_0/>.
